author: seroze1
content:

```py
    nonce: Uint

    code: bytes
    storage: Storage
```

author: seroze1

author: seroze1
content:
are my statements correct
1) if code of an account is empty, it is a normal account of a user. 
2) if code of an account is non-empty, then it is a contract account. 
3) an account can be associated with atmost one code (one contract )
